column1: The funeral service will be held on Friday June 12
column2: 2015 at 10:30 a.m. at Biega Funeral Home
column4: Middletown. Burial with military honors will be in the State Veterans Cemetery. Friends may call on Thursday from 6 to 8 p.m. or prior to the service on Friday from 9:30 to 10:30 a.m. at Biega Funeral Home.
